channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 24 hours after shooting, migrants show up to ICE Dallas facility fearful of missing their appointments
item.description: The ICE facility in Dallas where three detainees were killed in a shooting on Wednesday is still closed, but many people with scheduled check-ins stil...

item.title: Dallas shooter sought to 'terrorize' ICE workers, official says
item.description: "I want to cause terror," the gunman behind Wednesday's deadly attack on a Dallas ICE immigration facility allegedly wrote in a note, according to aut...

item.title: Latest update of 1844 American songbook reflects new generation of 'Sacred Harp' singers
item.description: An 1844 religiously inspired songbook that uses shape notes to help people read music got a major update recently and it attracting younger singers.

item.title: Trump advises parents on hepatitis B vaccine. Here's why doctors say he's wrong
item.description: It's unusual for Presidents to give medical advise. But this week President Trump told parents to delay giving their kids a hep b shot until they turn...

item.title: The U.N. utters the word: Dementia
item.description: For the first time, the United Nations has issued a political declaration pledging to address dementia. Will it make a difference?

item.title: Trump urges Turkey to stop buying Russian oil as Erdogan chases deal on F-35s
item.description: The US president suggests the US could lift sanctions on Turkey and allow it to buy F-35 jets.

item.title: From former president to future prisoner: Sarkozy's conviction divides France
item.description: Sarkozy is back where he used to be â€“ dominating the news and dividing the nation, writes the BBC's Hugh Schofield.

item.title: Starbucks CEO says company plans to close underperforming stores
item.description: Starbucks' overhaul will cost $1 billion as it shutters locations and cuts 900 nonretail employees.

item.title: Palestinian president says ready to work with Trump for two-state peace plan
item.description: In a speech to the UN, Mahmoud Abbas also calls on more countries to recognise a Palestinian state.

item.title: New renderings show more details of White House ballroom under construction

item.title: Arizona jury convicts man on 8 murder charges for metro Phoenix shootings in 2017
LA County response to deadly fires slowed by lack of resources, outdated alert process, report says

item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has directed generals and admirals, as well as some of their staff, from around the world to come to Quantico, Virginia...

item.title: Man who fired on ICE facility hated US government, sought to kill federal agents, officials say
item.description: The gunman who opened fire on an Immigration and Customs Enforcement facility in Dallas hated the U.S. government and wanted to incite terror by killi...

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: The Dish: Husband and wife duos

item.title: Israeli strike on Yemen's Houthis reportedly kills eight
item.description: The Israeli military says its "most powerful strike" in Yemen targeted security and military targets, but the Houthis say civilian facilities were hit...

item.title: Dallas shooter intended target to be ICE not detainees - officials
item.description: One detainee was killed and two others critically injured after a shooting at a Dallas ICE facility on Wednesday.
